column5: Ranch House 3 miles from Downtown Bandera, TX. One mile from Mansfield Park and the Medina River. Sleeps up to 12 guests. 2 Bathrooms. Access to pool at Host House. Cable TV. Sits on 20 acres. Full Kitchen. Poker Room. WIFI. Private Hot Tub. Fishing.
column8: Hot Tub & Pool Access in Bandera!
